overview.headline: Book your greatest fake vacation!
overview.text: Coming from the world of business and consulting where reusability was the key to efficiently deliever with consitstency,  and knowing reusability is a core concept of programming, I was a little surprised that reusable component frameworks and related libraries weren’t well....a little more reusable and efficiently used. Simply styling a third party component can become an ownerous task in reverse engineering. This was the inspiration for this library.  Perhaps there is a path forward with Themeweaver and “headless” component systems like Radix UI.
bullets: Custom themes styles using semantic names
Responsive styles set by custom breakpoints

overview.headline: Thank you for visiting!
overview.text: Coming from the world of business and consulting where reusability was the key to efficiently deliever with consitstency,  and knowing reusability is a core concept of programming, I was a little surprised that reusable component frameworks and related libraries weren’t well....a little more reusable and efficiently used. Simply styling a third party component can be challenging that is when you can hack it to function the way it’s needed. This was the inspiration for this library.  Perhaps there is a path forward with Themeweaver and “headless” component systems like Radix UI.

Responsive styles set by custom breakpoints
